page.title: 04INDUSTRY
page.content: Blackpool's Golden Mile may have suffered a decline but her future may be connected with industry. Test drills have raised hopes of fields of natural gas, and perhaps oil, off the coast. British Gas has made discoveries of gas 25 miles out to sea, and other companies are buying concessions to drill between North Wales and Morecambe Bay. Some Blackpool people feel that industrial development may kill the holiday resort, while others think it may lead to a new prosperity with a major extension of the Blackpool Airport.
